wrapScienceJ.wrapImaJ.core

Interface ImageCoreGray8

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ImageCore, ResourceCore
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ImageCoreGray8IJ, ImageThresholdingIJ

    public interface ImageCoreGray8
extends ImageCore
    Defines specific operations for 8 bits per pixels gray levels images.

    • Method Summary

      Constructs and retrieves the histogram of an image

    • Method Detail

      • buildHistogram

        long[] buildHistogram()
        Constructs and retrieves the histogram of an image
        Returns:
        The histogram of the 3D image as an array of 256 values TODO make this method handle any 16 bits image.

      • buildHistogramExcludeBackground

        long[] buildHistogramExcludeBackground(int backgroungGrayLevel)
        Constructs and retrieves the histogram of an image. The background, characterized by its normalized gray level (between 0 and 255), is excluded from the histogram.
        Parameters:
        backgroungGrayLevel - The gray level to set to zero in the resulting histogram.
        Returns:
        The histogram of the 3D image as an array of 256 values TODO make this method handle any 16 bits image.
